Module org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core
Package org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core

Interface StatementBuilder.OngoingUpdate

All Superinterfaces:
ExposesCreate, ExposesFinish, ExposesMerge, ExposesReturning, ExposesWith, StatementBuilder.BuildableStatement<Statement>, StatementBuilder.ExposesDelete, StatementBuilder.ExposesForeach, StatementBuilder.ExposesSet
All Known Subinterfaces:
StatementBuilder.OngoingMerge
Enclosing interface:
StatementBuilder
public static interface StatementBuilder.OngoingUpdate extends StatementBuilder.BuildableStatement<Statement>, ExposesCreate, ExposesMerge, StatementBuilder.ExposesDelete, ExposesReturning, ExposesFinish, ExposesWith, StatementBuilder.ExposesSet, StatementBuilder.ExposesForeach
An ongoing update statement that can be used to chain more update statements or add a with or return clause.
Since:
1.0
